title: Physico-mathesis de lumine, coloribus, et iride, aliisque adnexis libri duo, in quorum primo afferuntur noua experimenta, & rationes ab ijs deductae pro substantialitate luminis. In secundo autem dissoluuntur argumenta in primo adducta, & probabiliter sus
author: Grimaldi, Francesco Maria, 1616-1680
